test.name: Show help output

kw.name: Run Envoy
Run Process
kw.msg: Starting process: uv run python -m envoy --help
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg:
Usage: python -m envoy [OPTIONS] ENV_FILE EXAMPLE_FILE
╭─ Arguments ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮ │ * env_file TEXT [default: None] [required] │ │ * example_file TEXT [default: None] [required] │ ╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯ ╭─ Options ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮ │ --warn-additional-keys --no-warn-additional-keys Whether to warn when additional keys are found in the .env [default: no-warn-additional-keys] │ │ --warn-uninitialised-keys --no-warn-uninitialised-keys Whether to warn when keys are found in the .env but not initialised with a value │ │ [default: no-warn-uninitialised-keys] │ │ --install-completion Install completion for the current shell. │ │ --show-completion Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or customize the installation. │ │ --help Show this message and exit. │ ╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Runs the envoy program with given arguments

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

test.doc: Tests that the help documentation is shown correctly when requested
